member.name: M:DataQualityMonitoring.RangeTest.PublishFrame(TimeSeriesFramework.IFrame,System.Int32)
member.summary: Publish of time-aligned collection of values that arrived within the concentrator's defined .
member.param: of measurements with the same timestamp that arrived within that are ready for processing.
Index of within a second ranging from zero to - 1.
member.remarks: If user implemented publication function consistently exceeds available publishing time (i.e., 1 / seconds), concentration will fall behind. A small amount of this time is required by the for processing overhead, so actual total time available for user function process will always be slightly less than 1 / seconds.

member.name: P:DataQualityMonitoring.TimestampTest.WarnInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in seconds, between console updates.

member.name: P:DataQualityMonitoring.TimestampTest.ConcentratorName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the concentrator whose measurements will be checked for bad timestamps. Modifying this property will cause this adapter to search for an action adapter with the name that was supplied to the property. If one is found, it will detach from the current adapter and attach to the other. If one is not found, nothing will happen.

member.name: P:DataQualityMonitoring.TimestampTest.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.
